name: I Can't Drive This Thing!
description:
I can't drive this thing and neither can you! Just get to the end in the quickest time possible using WASD to control your vehicle whilst avoiding the out of control drivers  along the way easy right!

Now for the catch...... As you pass each checkpoint the control system will randomise so accelerate becomes brake, brake becomes left and so on so you have to have your wits about you!

Designed and Programmed by 

Anson Wong

Daniel Newsom 

Special Thanks to:  Andrew, Harry, Louie

for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

Know Issues:

1. Pause and Completing a Level may cause a loud continuous noise, beware of your ears!

2. Controls disappears if hit 2 or more ?  within 3 seconds
